sense.def:
Kdor
follows someone
, se premika za nekom.

seg.quote: He followed Sally into the yard.

sense.def:
To follow someone
pomeni iti tja, kamor je šel nekdo pred nami.

Kadar nekaj
follows a particular event
, se zgodi pozneje kot določeni dogodek.

seg.quote: In the days that followed, Keith could talk of nothing else.
...outings to the cinema followed by tea at Lyons Corner House.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekaj
follows
, hočemo povedati, da je tisto res, ker je res tudi nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Just because they are old, it doesn't follow that they have to be patronized.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
as follows
napovemo seznam stvari ali opis načina, kako je nekaj narejeno.

seg.quote: The contents are as follows: one black desk, one grey wastepaper bin, two red chairs.

sense.def:
To follow a path or river
pomeni iti po poti ali ob reki.

To follow someone's instructions, advice, or example
pomeni storiti tako, kot zahtevajo navodila, nasvet ali primer, ali storiti, kar stori nekdo drug.

seg.quote: She promised to follow his advice.

sense.def:
To follow a particular course of action
pomeni nekaj storiti tako, kot je bilo v načrtu.

seg.quote: This forced them to follow a tight money policy.

sense.def:
To follow an explanation or the plot of a story
pomeni razumeti razlago ali slediti poteku zgodbe.

seg.quote: They were having some difficulty in following the plot.

sense.def:
To follow a series of events or a television serial
pomeni zanimati se za vrsto dogodkov ali televizijsko nadaljevanko in temu slediti.

Kdor
follows something up
, poskuša o nečem več izvedeli.

seg.quote: It's an idea which has been followed up by a group of researchers at Birmingham.
